name: The Word The
description:
Join Grace and her roommates as they overcome real hardships in a modern absurdist world, strengthening their bond as friends. Inspired by Sara Ahmed's book, Living a Feminist Life, this Twine game aims to delight you with surrealism and wit, all the while challenging you to think with compassion. Go through Grace's two day journey around the house, helping  the people she cares about. Maybe, just maybe... you'll help Marty finally get rid of that lawn mower he was born with.

  • Short and Sweet!
    • Complete a playthrough in a sitting! With only 37 passages of varying length, it's short enough to be done in an hour or so but long enough to  get to know the characters and immerse yourself in the story.
  • Hilariously Bizarre!
    • From Supergame Superstar: Tommy Rodeo to treacherous tarot cards, have a chuckle at the charming details sprinkled into the world.
  • Your Choices Matter...
    • Choose how you want the day to go and shape everyone's future. 
  • Two Endings.
    • You have the option to change the world or experience the chilling end of a world gone sour.

Enjoy Version 1.0 with the full story and content cues complete! This will be an ongoing work with a few more backgrounds on the way.  If you have any constructive feedback, please leave it in the comments. Thank you!
